J. B. Rainsberger wrote:


>Agreed. I just want people to expose themselves to both. They may not be
>aware of the choice. That and jWebUnit.

I recently discovered maxq (http://maxq.tigris.org/). After a quick trial I
suspect I'll be using this instead of HttpUnit for much of my functional
testing in the future.
